yeah this forced over to magnets thing is pretty lame. I don't want to upgrade my torrent downloader client. It looks and works how I like it. I don't want all this extra shit and lack of control over my downloads. although I got it to work with out upgrading. just unnecessary extra steps and a longer wait time to start downloading.  Don't really see the benefit of these magnets for anyone..
Magnet links benefit sites like TPB, not users. Can't believe they're giving users severe problems (and that TPB is linking/advertising uTorrent)..
Yeah god forbid this site that gives you FREE anything-you-want should change to something that helps insure it stays around for longer...
I'm all butthurt cause I dont wanna upgrade my client!  waaah!
